com.vectorprint.report.itext.style

Interface BaseStyler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, DocumentAware, Observer, com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Advanced<DATATYPE>, DocumentStyler<RD>, FormFieldStyler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFieldStyler, AbstractPositioning, AbstractStyler, AddCell, AdvancedImpl, Alignment, Background, Barcode, Border, ColRowSpan, DebugStyler, DocumentSettings, FieldBackground, FieldBorder, FieldFont, Font, Height, Image, ImageAlign, ImportPdf, ImportTiff, Indent, KeepTogether, Leading, Link, List, ListItem, NewLine, NewPage, NoWrap, Padding, Page, Rotation, Shadow, Shape, SimpleColumns, Spacing, Table, Text, Underline, Zebra

    public interface BaseStyler
extends com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameterizable, DocumentAware
    Stylers are responsible for styling iText building blocks (Elements, fields) for reports. Stylers can be found using a StylerFactory, after finding them stylers can be used as argument calling a ElementProducer#createElement(java.lang.Object, java.util.Collection, java.lang.Class) , the returned element can then be added to the document, see BaseReportGenerator.createAndAddElement(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Class, java.lang.String...).
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
    See Also:
    BaseReportGenerator#createAndAddElement(java.lang.Object, java.util.Collection, java.lang.Class)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BaseStyler.ALIGN
      enum constants for horizontal and vertical alignment combinations
      static class  BaseStyler.POSITION
      enum constants for indicating top, right, left and bottom combinations for example for borders on rectangles
